name: src/fetcher.js
Fetcher
description: Performs REST requests to constant url.

params.name: defaultOptions
params.description: default options used for every request

params.name: handlers
params.description: functions for processing every request and response

name: src/index.js

properties.name: handleRequestBody
properties.description:
function applied to every request body,
e.g. `body => JSON.stringify(body)`

properties.name: handleResponse
properties.description:
function applied to every response,
e.g. `async response => await response.json()`

name: src/path-fetcher.js
PathFetcher
description: Performs REST requests to constant base url with different relative paths.

params.name: defaultOptions
params.description: default options used for every request

params.name: handlers
params.description: functions for processing every request and response

name: get
description: Performs GET request to url path.

name: post
description: Performs POST request to url path.

name: put
description: Performs PUT request to url path.

name: delete
description: Performs DELETE request to url path.

name: head
description: Performs HEAD request to url path.

name: patch
description: Performs PATCH request to url path.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "fetchers",
  "version": "0.2.0",
  "description": "Semantic RESTful Fetch API wrappers",
  "author": {
    "name": "Vitaliy Potapov",
    "email": "noginsk@rambler.ru"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git://github.com/vitalets/fetchers.git"
  },
  "main": "dist/es2017/index.umd.js",
  "scripts": {
    "code": "npm run lint-all",
    "lint-all": "eslint src test",
    "lint-staged": "lint-staged",
    "build-es5": "TARGET=es5 webpack",
    "build-es2017": "TARGET=es2017 webpack",
    "test": "npm run test-src",
    "test-src": "mocha test/specs -r @std/esm -r test/globals.js",
    "test-es5": "npm run build-es5 && LIB_PATH=dist/es5/index.umd.js npm t",
    "test-es2017": "npm run build-es2017 && LIB_PATH=dist/es2017/index.umd.js npm t",
    "test-installed": "node scripts/install-local && LIB_PATH=.installed/node_modules/fetchers npm t",
    "test-all": "run-s test test-es5 test-es2017 test-installed",
    "ci": "run-s code test-all",
    "docs": "esdoc",
    "prerelease": "run-s code test-all",
    "release": "npm version $VER && npm publish",
    "postrelease": "git push --follow-tags --no-verify",
    "release-patch": "VER=patch npm run release",
    "release-minor": "VER=minor npm run release",
    "diff": "git diff -- . ':!package-lock.json'",
    "precommit": "run-s lint-staged test",
    "prepush": "run-s code test test-es5"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "{src,test}/**/*.js": "eslint"
  },
  "@std/esm": {
    "esm": "js",
    "cjs": true
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "@std/esm": "^0.15.0",
    "babel-cli": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-runtyper": "^0.2.2",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-regenerator-runtime": "^6.5.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-mocha": "^4.11.0",
    "fetch-mock": "^5.13.1",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "install-local": "^0.4.0",
    "lint-staged": "^4.3.0",
    "mocha": "^4.0.1",
    "node-fetch": "^1.7.3",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.1",
    "webpack": "^3.8.1"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "fetch",
    "fetch-api",
    "rest",
    "restful",
    "promise"
  ],
  "license": "MIT"
}
name: package.json
